entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 5:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: E 25 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
